name: Computer Science & Engineering
shortDescription: Focuses on software, algorithms, data structures, and computing.
fullDescription: The Computer Science and Engineering department is dedicated to educating students in cutting-edge technologies, covering areas like Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Operating Systems, and advanced programming paradigms. We provide a robust curriculum that prepares students for the future of tech.

name: Information Technology
shortDescription: Deals with application development, network management, and data security.
fullDescription: The IT department prepares students to manage and secure complex information systems. Key focus areas include cloud computing, cybersecurity, web development, and enterprise resource planning. Our graduates are equipped for roles in system analysis and IT infrastructure.

name: Electronics & Communication Engineering
shortDescription: Covers electronic circuits, communication systems, and embedded technologies.
fullDescription: The ECE department is at the forefront of designing and developing electronic devices, circuits, and communication systems. The curriculum offers deep knowledge in VLSI design, wireless communication, signal processing, and embedded systems.

name: Mechanical Engineering
shortDescription: Focuses on design, analysis, manufacturing, and maintenance of mechanical systems.
fullDescription: The Mechanical Engineering department offers a diverse program covering thermodynamics, materials science, robotics, and fluid mechanics. Our hands-on approach ensures students gain practical expertise in modern industry demands.

name: Civil Engineering
shortDescription: Deals with the design, construction, and maintenance of the physical and naturally built environment.
fullDescription: Civil Engineering is an ever-green field focusing on infrastructure development. Our curriculum emphasizes structural analysis, transportation engineering, and environmental engineering, preparing students to build a sustainable future.

name: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
shortDescription: A comprehensive program designed to develop management and leadership skills.
fullDescription: The MBA program prepares students for leadership roles across various sectors. Key specializations include Finance, Marketing, Human Resources, and Operations Management, blending theoretical knowledge with real-world case studies.
